item.title: Easy French style punctuation with Vim/NVim
item.author: bkelly@coastsystems.net (Boyd Kelly)
item.description: Are you often having to type in English and in French like me? If so how are you managing the French requirment for a space before the question mark and exlamation mark? Obligatory in French but horrendous in English!
